data.luaFormula:
function params()
   return {"monster_level", "monster_grade_hidden_level", "stat_base", "monster_grade_level"}
end

function main()
   --By pass for monsters with 0 pm remains 0 pm : no scale but remains boostable, -1pm remains -1pm : no scale, no boostable)
   if stat_base == -1 then
      return stat_base
   end
   local original_lvl;

   if monster_grade_hidden_level == 0 then
      original_lvl = monster_grade_level
   else
      original_lvl = monster_grade_hidden_level
   end

   return stat_base + math.floor(math.pow((monster_level - original_lvl) / 70 , 0.77))
   -- return stat_base + math.floor(monster_level/100)
end

local monsterLifeCoef = 1.625
local monsterLifeSignificativeNumbers = 2	

function params()
   return {"monster_level", "stat_ratio"}
end

function roundToNearest(n, decimalCount)
   decimalCount = decimalCount or 0
   local offset = math.pow(10, decimalCount)
   local res = n * offset
   if res % 1 >= 0.5 then
      res = math.ceil(res)
   else
     res = math.floor(res)
   end
   return res / offset
end

function roundToSignificantFigures(num, n)
   if num == 0 then
      return 0
   end
   local d = math.ceil(math.log(math.abs(num)) / math.log(10))
   if d <= n then
      return num
   end
   local power = math.floor(d - n)
   local magnitude = math.floor(math.pow(10, power))
   return roundToNearest(num / magnitude) * magnitude
end

function main()
   if stat_ratio == nil then
      return 0
   end

   return math.max(1, roundToSignificantFigures(math.floor(stat_ratio * math.pow(monster_level, monsterLifeCoef)), monsterLifeSignificativeNumbers))
end

local GROUP_EXPERIENCE_BONUS = { 1, 1.1, 1.5, 2.3, 3.1, 3.6, 4.2, 4.7 }


-- players : list of fighter data
--   level : current level of fighter
--   isCompanion : if the fighter is a companion
--   isStillPresentInFight : if the fighter is still present in fight (if no surrender)
-- monsters : list of monster in fight
--   level : current level of monster
--   xp : default monster xp, set from AGT or from monster_xp script
--   bonusFamily : bonus coefficient if the family of this monster has a xp boost (1 for no bonus)
--   bonusAlmanach : bonus almanach if the current almanach has a xp boost on this monster (1 for no bonus)
--   alive : if the monster is dead in the end of the fight
-- fightIsWin true if the fight is win by the players
-- rewardRate : coefficient of the fight (bonusmap)
function params()
    return { "players", "monsters", "fightIsWin", "rewardRate" }
end

---Retrieve the max level from the players group
local function getMaxPlayerLevel()
    local maxLevel = 0
    for _, player in pairs(players) do
        if maxLevel < player.level then
            maxLevel = player.level
        end
    end

    return maxLevel;
end

-- Retrieve the total level from the group
local function getTotalPlayerLevel()
    local total = 0
    for _, player in pairs(players) do
        total = total + player.level
    end

    return total
end

-- Retrieve the total level from a specific monster wave
local function getMaxMonsterLevel()
    local total = 0
    for _, monsters in pairs(monsters) do
        total = total + monsters.level
    end

    return total
end

--Count how many human are present in this fight
--a human is present if this level is more than the minLevelRequired
--                   if he is not a companion
--                   if he is still present in fight
local function getHumansCount()
    local minLevelRequired = getMaxPlayerLevel() / 3

    local humansCount = 0

    for _, player in pairs(players) do
        if player.level > minLevelRequired and player.isCompanion == false and player.isStillPresentInFight then
            humansCount = humansCount + 1
        end
    end

    return humansCount
end

local function getGroupXPCoefficient()
    local coefficient = 1
    local totalMonsterLevel = getMaxMonsterLevel()
    local totalPlayerLevel = getTotalPlayerLevel()

    if totalPlayerLevel - 5 > totalMonsterLevel then
        coefficient = totalMonsterLevel / totalPlayerLevel
    else
        if totalMonsterLevel > totalPlayerLevel + 10 then
            coefficient = (totalPlayerLevel + 10) / totalMonsterLevel
        end
    end

    return coefficient;
end

local function getMonsterXP()
    local humansCountForXpBonus = getHumansCount(players)

    local totalXP = 0

    for _, monster in pairs(monsters) do
        if monster.alive == false then
            local monsterXp = monster.xp * monster.bonusFamily * monster.bonusAlmanach
            totalXP = totalXP + monsterXp
        end
    end

    totalXP = totalXP * getGroupXPCoefficient()

    if fightIsWin then
        if humansCountForXpBonus > 0 then
            totalXP = totalXP * GROUP_EXPERIENCE_BONUS[humansCountForXpBonus]
        end

    else
        totalXP = totalXP / 4
    end

    return totalXP
end

function main()
    return math.floor(getMonsterXP() * rewardRate)
end

-- xp : initial xp earn from monsters
-- monsters : list of object
--   level : level of monster
-- player : object
--   level : player level
--   wisdom : player wisdom
--   bonusMap : coefficient bonus from the map (prism boost)
--   bonusAlmanach : coefficient bonus from almanach (bonus xp on map)
-- maxLevel : level of the player group
-- challengeCoefficient bonus challenge for player
function params()
    return { "xp", "monsters", "player", "maxLevel", "challengeCoefficient" }
end


-- Retrieve the total level from a specific monster wave
local function getMaxMonsterLevel()
    local maxLevel = 0
    for _, monster in pairs(monsters) do
        if (maxLevel < monster.level) then
            maxLevel = monster.level
        end

    end

    return maxLevel
end

local function getPlayerXP()
    local maxMonsterLevel = getMaxMonsterLevel() * 2.5

    local levelPlayer = math.min(player.level, maxMonsterLevel)
    local baseXP = challengeCoefficient * ((xp * levelPlayer) / maxLevel)

    if player.wisdom > 0 then
        local wisdomPercent = (100 + player.wisdom) / 100
        baseXP = baseXP * wisdomPercent
    end

    if player.bonusMap > 1 then
        baseXP = baseXP * player.bonusMap
    end

    if player.bonusAlmanach > 1 then
        baseXP = baseXP * player.bonusAlmanach
    end

    return math.max(1, baseXP)
end

function main()

    if challengeCoefficient == nil then
        challengeCoefficient = 1
    end

    return math.floor(getPlayerXP())
end

-- xp : experience earn from the player
-- player : player object
--   level : player level
--   isRiding : if player is on a ride in the end of the fight
--   haveGuild : if player is on a guild
--   sharedXPCoefficient : coefficient bonus for guild and ride
--   unsharedXPCoefficient : coefficient bonus only for the player
--   rideXPBonus : coefficient bonus if the player have the ride characteristic bonus
-- ride : ride object
--   level : level of the ride
--   coefficient : experience shared coefficient
--   bonusAlmanach : almanach xp ride boost
--   wise : wise coefficient (if ride has wise capacity)
-- guild : guild object
--   level : level of the guild
--   coefficient : experience shared coefficient
-- bonus : should sharedXPCoefficient and unsharedXPCoefficient be applied ?

function params()
    return { "xp", "player", "ride", "guild", "bonus" }
end

local function getGlobalCoefficient()

    local coefficientLeft = 1

    local coefficientRide

    if player.isRiding then
        coefficientRide = ride.coefficient
    else
        coefficientRide = 0
    end

    coefficientLeft = coefficientLeft - coefficientRide

    local realGuildCoefficient = coefficientLeft * guild.coefficient
    coefficientLeft = coefficientLeft - realGuildCoefficient

    return {
        rideCoefficient = ride.coefficient,
        guildCoefficient = realGuildCoefficient,
        playerCoefficient = coefficientLeft
    }

end

local function getRideXP()
    if player.isRiding == false then
        return 0
    end

    local xpForRideBonus = xp * (20 + player.rideXPBonus) / 100

    local rideXP = getGlobalCoefficient().rideCoefficient * xp

    if bonus then
        rideXP = (rideXP + xpForRideBonus) * player.sharedXPCoefficient
    end

    local levelDiff = math.abs(player.level - ride.level)

    if levelDiff > 10 and levelDiff <= 20 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.8
    end
    if levelDiff > 20 and levelDiff <= 30 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.6
    end
    if levelDiff > 30 and levelDiff <= 40 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.4
    end
    if levelDiff > 40 and levelDiff <= 50 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.3
    end
    if levelDiff > 50 and levelDiff <= 60 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.2
    end
    if levelDiff > 60 and levelDiff <= 70 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.15
    end
    if levelDiff > 70 then
        rideXP = rideXP * 0.1
    end

    rideXP = rideXP * ride.wise
    rideXP = rideXP / 10

    if bonus then
        rideXP = rideXP + (rideXP * ride.bonusAlmanach) / 100
    end

    return rideXP
end

local function getGuildXP()
    if player.haveGuild == false then
        return 0
    end

    local guildXP = getGlobalCoefficient().guildCoefficient * xp

    local levelDiff = math.abs(player.level - guild.level)

    if levelDiff > 10 and levelDiff <= 20 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 80) / 100
    end
    if levelDiff > 20 and levelDiff <= 30 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 60) / 100
    end
    if levelDiff > 30 and levelDiff <= 40 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 40) / 100
    end
    if levelDiff > 40 and levelDiff <= 50 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 30) / 100
    end
    if levelDiff > 50 and levelDiff <= 60 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 20) / 100
    end
    if levelDiff > 60 and levelDiff <= 70 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 15) / 100
    end
    if levelDiff > 70 then
        guildXP = (guildXP * 10) / 100
    end

    guildXP = guildXP / 10

    if bonus then
        guildXP = guildXP * player.sharedXPCoefficient
    end

    return guildXP
end

local function getPlayerXP()
    local playerXP = xp * getGlobalCoefficient().playerCoefficient

    if bonus == false then
        return playerXP
    end

    return playerXP * player.unsharedXPCoefficient
end

function main()
    if xp < 0 then
        return {
            ride = 0,
            guild = 0,
            player = 0
        }
    end

    return {
        ride = math.floor(getRideXP()),
        guild = math.floor(getGuildXP()),
        player = math.floor(getPlayerXP())
    }

end

function params()
    return {"prospection_bonus"}
end

function main()
--Fontion exponentielle 
    local expo_a = 85 
        --Paramètres qui sert à gérer la pente de la courbe exponentielle.

    local expo_O = 150
        --Paramètre qui détermine à quelle valeur de prospection_bonus on atteint 50% de bonus.

    local expo_m = 117
        --Paramètre qui détermine le %age maximum de la courbe.

--Variables nécéssaires pour la formule
    local prospection_max_multiplier = 1.5
        --Valeur maximale atteignable du prospection_score. 
        --La fonction exponentielle va faire varier prospection_score entre 0 et prospection_max_multiplier.

    local lower_prospection_score_to_1 = 0.26
        --Ce paramètre permet de rectifier la courbe pour que le bonus commence à 0 lorsque le joueur a prospection_bonus de 0. 
        --Il est calculé à la main.

--Formule finale
    local prospection_score = math.min(2.5,math.max(1,(1+prospection_max_multiplier*(expo_m*((1/(1+(math.exp(-((prospection_bonus-expo_O)/expo_a))))))/100))-lower_prospection_score_to_1))

return prospection_score
end
